channel.title: Gambler 55x2 [PI]
channel.description:
Does anybody have/know how I can make a gambler that hosts 55x2 and I can give him ANY item and he gives me x2 that pot
add me on skype: tank.dontascape//or comment.

item.title: Gambler 55x2 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

You need to be more clear about what you want. This is also the Server Help section - not the Request a Spoon-feeding section.

Youâ€™re wanting a N.P.C. to function as a gambling sequence? There are Tutorials on how to do something similar to this, such as Blackjack gambling. You can use this as a structure and make edits such as the Math Floor.
